sections.heading: in civil actions; conviction not admissible
sections.text: No evidence of the conviction of any person for any violation of any provision of the Nebraska Rules of the Road shall be admissible in any court in any civil action.SourceLaws 1973, LB 45, ยง 118;R.S.1943, (1988), ยง 39-6,118;Laws 1993, LB 370, ยง 189.Annota
